title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 416 - Civil Penalties And Interest On Underpayments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 416 - Civil Penalties And Interest On Underpayments

State Regulations
§ 416.1 - Failure to file a return or to pay the tax due
§ 416.2 - Personal liability for a failure to pay the tax
§ 416.3 - Repealed
§ 416.4 - Failure to pay the tax due to fraud
§ 416.5 - Possession of untaxed motor fuel by a filling station owner
§ 416.6 - Interest on underpayments
§ 416.7 - Unpaid tax, penalties and interest
§ 416.8 - Criminal penalties, seizures and forfeitures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 416

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 475, 509[7], 697[a], 1096 [a], 1142[1], [8], 1250, 1415[a], art. 12-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
